title: Shepherd's pie with curried mash
ingredients: ['1 small onion, chopped', '450g (1 lb) lamb mince', '1 tsp thyme', '4 heaped tbsp plain flour', '2 tbsp tomato ketchup', '1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce', '350ml lamb or chicken stock', '6 tbsp olive oil', 'For the mash', '1.3kg (3 lb) potatoes, peeled, boiled and mashed', 'milk, butter, salt, pepper to taste', '1 tsp paprika', '1 tsp curry powder']
